name: py-dask

variants.name: yaml
variants.description: Ensure support for YAML configuration files

description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-cloudpickle
dependencies.description: Extended pickling support for Python objects.

dependencies.name: py-toolz
dependencies.description: A set of utility functions for iterators, functions, and dictionaries

dependencies.name: py-partd
dependencies.description: Key-value byte store with appendable values.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-bokeh
dependencies.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-xgboost
dependent_to.description:
XGBoost is an optimized distributed gradient boosting library designed
to be highly efficient, flexible and portable.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-xgboost
dependent_to.description:
Distributed training with XGBoost and Dask.distributed. Deprecated: use
`py-xgboost+dask` instead.

dependent_to.name: py-datacube
dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image
dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.
